statements: UPDATE PlayerData SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;

UPDATE player_data SET score = score + 10 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 5 WHERE item_name = 'sword' AND player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE player_inventory SET quantity = 10, item_name = 'Potion' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE players SET score = 100 WHERE username = 'player1';
UPDATE player_items SET quantity = 5 WHERE player_id = 1 AND item_id = 101;

UPDATE player_items SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE item_id = 3 AND player_id = 2;
